MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:45pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:10pm on 24th February 2021.
